long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app adds a possibility, to turn any webpage, into dark mode with just one click of a button. The buttons location is customisable, and you can taylor it, so that it does not block any content. All accessibility features will remain the same, as we use high-level styling technology to ensure that the content and images stay the same throughout your whole experience. Wether the app is made in dark or light mode, our extension will work on all of your favorite websites.
